title: Game Development
body: Below is a short demo reel of my various experiments in Unity, Unreal Engine, and the colateral artwork I had to create to support it. Most of that artwork was created in blender, zbrush and modo.

title: Traditional Sculpting
body: My interest in traditional sculpting started from getting introduced to Garage Kits by my father in law. Slowly I became more interested in producing my own GK than purchasing them, and eventually that has led into digital sculpting which is what I'm currently trying my hand at.
